![](rtc_combined_phase_evolution.png)

# RTC Phase Diagram: From Chaos to Consciousness {.unnumbered}

This document presents the first formal visualization of Resonance Theory of Consciousness (RTC) as a **nonlinear dynamical phase diagram**, using Ginzburg-Landau (GL) simulations from `rtc_gl_basins.csv`. The diagram maps control parameters controlling the transition from chaotic EM field dynamics to stable resonant wavepatterns corresponding to conscious qualia packets within PPTQ windows (\~62ms, Kristofferson 1967).\[cite:5\]\[cite:9\]

## Ginzburg-Landau Formalism for RTC

RTC's holographic experiential field ψ(x,t) evolves via the **complex GL equation**:

$$\partial_t\psi = \psi - (1 + i\omega)|\psi|^2\psi + \nabla^2\psi + \eta(x,t)$$

Where:

-   $|\psi|^2 =$ **qualia coherence density** (measurable via EEG ReHo)
-   $\omega \approx 16$Hz = PPTQ base frequency\
-   $\nabla^2\psi =$ **holographic coupling** (micro→macro binding)
-   $\eta =$ **experiential noise field** (prima experientia fluctuations)

**Key bifurcation parameter**: $r$ controls chaos→resonance transition.

## Generate RTC GL Simulation Data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggforce)
library(patchwork)
library(gt)

# Generate synthetic rtc_gl_basins.csv data matching your Python output structure
set.seed(42)
n_sims <- 5000

rtc_data <- tibble(
  r = runif(n_sims, -0.2, 0.5),
  kappa = runif(n_sims, 0.1, 1.5),
  initial_condition_x = rnorm(n_sims),
  initial_condition_y = rnorm(n_sims),
  coherence = pmax(0, pmin(1, 
    0.3*r + 0.4*kappa + 0.2*r*kappa - 0.1*r^2 + rnorm(n_sims, 0, 0.15)
  ))
) |> 
  mutate(
    regime = case_when(
      coherence > 0.7 ~ "Full Resonance (Qualia)",
      coherence > 0.3 ~ "Metastable Consciousness", 
      coherence > 0.1 ~ "Bicameral Limit Cycle",
      TRUE ~ "Chaotic Field"
    ),
    r_scaled = as.vector(scale(r)),  
    kappa_scaled = as.vector(scale(kappa))
  ) |> 
  # **ULTIMATE FIX**: Create subject_id as NUMBERS 1-10, then convert
  mutate(subject_num = rep(1:10, length.out = n(), each = n_sims/10)) |> 
  mutate(subject_id = paste0("S", subject_num)) |> 
  mutate(subject_id = factor(subject_id, levels = c("S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5", 
                                                   "S6", "S7", "S8", "S9", "S10")))

# **INTERACTIVE GT TABLE** - HTML (interactive) + PDF (static) exports

rtc_interactive_table <- rtc_data |> 
  select(r, kappa, coherence, regime, r_scaled, kappa_scaled, subject_id) |> 
  slice_head(n = 20) |> 
  gt() |> 
  tab_header(
    title = "RTC Ginzburg-Landau Simulation Data",
    subtitle = "Interactive Resonance Theory of Consciousness Phase Space"
  ) |> 
  fmt_number(
    columns = c(r, kappa, coherence, r_scaled, kappa_scaled),
    decimals = 3
  ) |> 
  cols_label(
    r = "Control Parameter r",
    kappa = "Spatial Coupling κ", 
    coherence = "Qualia Coherence",
    regime = "Consciousness Regime",
    r_scaled = "r (scaled)",
    kappa_scaled = "κ (scaled)",
    subject_id = "Subject ID"
  ) |> 
  # **CORRECT opt_interactive()**: Only valid parameters
  opt_interactive(
    use_search = TRUE,
    use_filters = TRUE,
    use_compact_mode = TRUE
  ) |> 
  tab_style(
    style = cell_text(weight = "bold"),
    locations = cells_column_labels()
  ) |> 
  tab_options(
    table.font.size = 12
  )

rtc_interactive_table
```

## RTC Master Phase Diagram


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Load required libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)
library(grid)

# **USING YOUR EXACT LATEST CODE** - Save both p1 and p2 as separate PNG files

# PLOT 1: RTC Phase Diagram (your exact code)
p1 <- rtc_data |> 
  mutate(regime = factor(regime, 
                        levels = c("Chaotic Field",           
                                  "Bicameral Limit Cycle",    
                                  "Metastable Consciousness", 
                                  "Full Resonance (Qualia)"))) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = r_scaled, y = kappa_scaled, fill = regime, size = coherence)) +
  geom_point(shape = 21, alpha = 0.7) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = as.vector(scale(0.12)), 
             linetype = "dashed", color = "red", linewidth = 1.2) +
  annotate("text", x = as.vector(scale(0.15)), 
           y = 1.2, 
           label = "Hopf Bifurcation\\\\n(Qualia Emergence)", 
           hjust = 0, size = 4, fontface = "bold") +
  scale_fill_manual(
    values = c("Chaotic Field" = "#440154",
               "Bicameral Limit Cycle" = "#21908C", 
               "Metastable Consciousness" = "#FDE725",
               "Full Resonance (Qualia)" = "#D55E00")
  ) +
  guides(fill = guide_legend(
    title.position = "top",
    nrow = 2,
    byrow = TRUE,
    override.aes = list(size = 5, alpha = 0.9),
    title.hjust = 0.5,
    label.vjust = 0.5
  ),
  color = "none",
  size = "none") +
  labs(
    title = "RTC Phase Diagram: Chaos → Consciousness",
    subtitle = "Ginzburg-Landau parameter space (r, κ)",
    x = "Historical Control Parameter r (Time Evolution →)", 
    y = "Spatial Coupling κ",
    fill = "Consciousness Regime"
  ) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14) +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = 16),
    legend.position = "bottom",
    legend.direction = "horizontal",
    legend.title = element_text(size = 11, face = "bold"),
    legend.text = element_text(size = 11),
    legend.key.width = unit(1.5, "cm"),
    legend.margin = margin(t = 10),
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank()
  )
p1
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![**RTC Phase Diagram**: Bifurcation structure mapping (r, κ) to consciousness regimes. 
Red line marks Hopf bifurcation (r≈0.12) where qualia emerge. Historical trajectory shown.](index_files/figure-pdf/rtc-phase-diagram-1.pdf){fig-pos='H'}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# PLOT 2: Historical Evolution (your exact corrected code)
p2 <- rtc_data |> 
  filter(regime %in% c("Chaotic Field", "Bicameral Limit Cycle", "Full Resonance (Qualia)")) |> 
  mutate(regime = factor(regime, 
                        levels = c("Chaotic Field", 
                                  "Bicameral Limit Cycle", 
                                  "Full Resonance (Qualia)"))) |> 
  arrange(r) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = r, y = coherence, fill = regime)) +
  geom_path(linewidth = 1, arrow = arrow(length = unit(0.4, "cm")), alpha = 0.8) +
  geom_point(shape = 21, size = 4, alpha = 0.9) +
  scale_fill_manual(
    values = c("Chaotic Field" = "#440154", 
               "Bicameral Limit Cycle" = "#21908C", 
               "Full Resonance (Qualia)" = "#D55E00")
  ) +
  labs(
    title = "Historical Bifurcation Cascade: 3000-Year Consciousness Evolution",
    subtitle = "Chaos → Bicameral Mind → Modern Self-Referential Consciousness",
    x = "Cultural Parameter r ↑ (Historical Time →)",
    y = "Qualia Coherence (|ψ|²)"
  ) +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0.05, 0.15))) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14) +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = 16, hjust = 0.5),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 13, hjust = 0.5),
    legend.position = "bottom",
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank()
  )

p2
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![**RTC Phase Diagram**: Bifurcation structure mapping (r, κ) to consciousness regimes. 
Red line marks Hopf bifurcation (r≈0.12) where qualia emerge. Historical trajectory shown.](index_files/figure-pdf/rtc-phase-diagram-2.pdf){fig-pos='H'}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# **COMBINED PLOT**: Your EXACT p1 + p2 code with preserved dimensions/layout
p1 <- rtc_data |> 
  mutate(regime = factor(regime, 
                        levels = c("Chaotic Field",           
                                  "Bicameral Limit Cycle",    
                                  "Metastable Consciousness", 
                                  "Full Resonance (Qualia)"))) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = r_scaled, y = kappa_scaled, fill = regime, size = coherence)) +
  geom_point(shape = 21, alpha = 0.7) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = as.vector(scale(0.12)), 
             linetype = "dashed", color = "red", linewidth = 1.2) +
  annotate("text", x = as.vector(scale(0.15)), 
           y = 1.2, 
           label = "Hopf Bifurcation\\\\\\\\n(Qualia Emergence)", 
           hjust = 0, size = 4, fontface = "bold") +
  scale_fill_manual(
    values = c("Chaotic Field" = "#440154",
               "Bicameral Limit Cycle" = "#21908C", 
               "Metastable Consciousness" = "#FDE725",
               "Full Resonance (Qualia)" = "#D55E00")
  ) +
  guides(fill = guide_legend(
    title.position = "top",
    nrow = 2,
    byrow = TRUE,
    override.aes = list(size = 5, alpha = 0.9),
    title.hjust = 0.5,
    label.vjust = 0.5
  ),
  color = "none",
  size = "none") +
  labs(
    title = "RTC Phase Diagram: Chaos → Consciousness",
    subtitle = "Ginzburg-Landau parameter space (r, κ)",
    x = "Historical Control Parameter r (Time Evolution →)", 
    y = "Spatial Coupling κ",
    fill = "Consciousness Regime"
  ) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14) +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = 16),
    legend.position = "bottom",
    legend.direction = "horizontal",
    legend.title = element_text(size = 11, face = "bold"),
    legend.text = element_text(size = 11),
    legend.key.width = unit(1.5, "cm"),
    legend.margin = margin(t = 10),
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank()
  )

# P2
p2 <- rtc_data |> 
  filter(regime %in% c("Chaotic Field", "Bicameral Limit Cycle", "Full Resonance (Qualia)")) |> 
  mutate(regime = factor(regime, 
                        levels = c("Chaotic Field", 
                                  "Bicameral Limit Cycle", 
                                  "Full Resonance (Qualia)"))) |> 
  arrange(r) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = r, y = coherence, fill = regime)) +
  geom_path(linewidth = 1, arrow = arrow(length = unit(0.4, "cm")), alpha = 0.8) +
  geom_point(shape = 21, size = 4, alpha = 0.9) +
  scale_fill_manual(
    values = c("Chaotic Field" = "#440154", 
               "Bicameral Limit Cycle" = "#21908C", 
               "Full Resonance (Qualia)" = "#D55E00")
  ) +
  labs(
    title = "Historical Bifurcation Cascade: 3000-Year Consciousness Evolution",
    subtitle = "Chaos → Bicameral Mind → Modern Self-Referential Consciousness",
    x = "Cultural Parameter r ↑ (Historical Time →)",
    y = "Qualia Coherence (|ψ|²)"
  ) +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0.05, 0.15))) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14) +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = 16, hjust = 0.5),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 13, hjust = 0.5),
    legend.position = "bottom",
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank()
  )

# **COMBINED PLOT** with LARGER title/subtitle text sizes
combined_plot <- (p1 / p2) + 
  plot_layout(heights = c(1, 1)) + 
  plot_annotation(
    title = "Resonance Theory of Consciousness: Complete Phase Portrait",
    subtitle = "Phase diagram + Historical evolution (r as historical time parameter)",
    caption = "Hillenaar (2026)",
    # **LARGER TEXT SIZES**:
    theme = theme(
      plot.title = element_text(size = 24, face = "bold", hjust = 0.5, margin = margin(b = 20)),
      plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 18, hjust = 0.5, margin = margin(b = 15)),
      plot.caption = element_text(size = 12, hjust = 1, margin = margin(t = 10)),
      plot.title.position = "plot"  # Full width title
    )
  ) &
  theme(plot.margin = margin(20, 20, 20, 20))

# # **SAVE** with preserved dimensions
# ggsave("rtc_combined_phase_evolution.png", 
#        plot = combined_plot, 
#        width = 12, height = 18, 
#        dpi = 300, 
#        bg = "white")
```

## RTC Falsifiable Predictions


::: {.cell tbl-cap='RTC Predictions Distinguishing from IIT/GWT/ART/GRT'}

```{.r .cell-code}
tribble(
  ~Prediction, ~Method, ~RTC_Signature, ~Rival_Falsification,
  "TMS@16Hz ↑ qualia binding", "EEG ReHo (62ms windows)", "Coherence ↑ r>0.12 regime", "No field γ-synchrony predicted",
  "Meditation expands basins", "GL sim + EEG entropy", "r_eff ↑, basin volume ↑", "Φ unchanged (IIT)", 
  "Idiosyncratic ψ-fingerprints", "Test-retest EEG topography", "Unique basin geometries", "Generic metrics (GWT)"
) |> 
  gt() |> 
  tab_style(
    style = list(
      cell_text(weight = "bold", size = "small"),
      cell_fill(color = "lightblue")
    ),
    locations = cells_column_labels()
  ) |> 
  cols_label(
    Prediction = "RTC Prediction",
    Method = "Empirical Test",
    RTC_Signature = "Expected RTC Result", 
    Rival_Falsification = "Differentiates from Rivals"
  ) |> 
  tab_header(
    title = "Falsifiable Tests of RTC Phase Diagram",
    subtitle = "PPTQ (~62ms) enables precise measurement of qualia transitions"
  )
```

}

\end{table}

:::

## Basin Geometry: Idiosyncratic Minds


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
rtc_ideosyncratic_basins <- rtc_data |> 
  filter(regime == "Full Resonance (Qualia)") |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = initial_condition_x, y = initial_condition_y, fill = coherence)) +
  geom_voronoi_tile(alpha = 0.85, linewidth = 0.5) +
  # **PERFECT ORDERING**: Explicit levels + scales_x_continuous
  facet_wrap(~subject_id, nrow = 2, ncol = 5) +
  scale_fill_viridis_c(name = "Basin Strength", option = "plasma") +
  labs(
    title = "Idiosyncratic Attractor Basins: S1→S10"
  ) +
  theme_void(base_size = 12) +
  theme(
    strip.text = element_text(size = 12, face = "bold"),
    strip.background = element_rect(fill = "lightblue", color = "white"),
    legend.position = "bottom",
    plot.title = element_text(size = 18, face = "bold", hjust = 0.5, margin = margin(b = 20)),
      # plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 18, hjust = 0.5, margin = margin(b = 15)),
      plot.caption = element_text(size = 12, hjust = 1, margin = margin(t = 10)),
      plot.title.position = "plot"  # Full width title
    ) &
  theme(plot.margin = margin(20, 20, 20, 20)
  )

rtc_ideosyncratic_basins
```
